Jump Spring: [#e6ffe6]{a}*Force-triggers the item in the FOCUS slot, twice.{a}*On trigger, FOCUS moves one slot to the right.{a}*Rests on [#ffb3ff]SLOT #7[#e6ffe6], and wraps around to [#ffb3ff]SLOT #1[#e6ffe6]. {a}(FOCUS slot: #{b})
*Rerolls in all shops cost 2 coins.{a}*Cost increases by 1 after each reroll.{a}*Cost resets after leaving shop.{a}*You have infinite rerolls.
